name: Fidget Spinner - Tap Tap Fast
description:
It’s all going viral this days “Fidget Spinner” but don’t get stuck to one common play.
Try this #1 new gameplay of Fidget Spinner - Tap Tap Fast

How to play:
Tap fast, don’t stop before it touches the spikes below

It’s damn addictive. Don’t break your phone down. Challenge everyone
